snippet: Anything Richard Prince or John Baldessari or Ed Ruscha can do, Eric Doeringer can do too, as he demonstrates in a show at Mulherin & Pollard.
abstract: Ken Johnson reviews works by Eric Doeringer at Mulherin & Pollard gallery.
lead_paragraph: Anything Richard Prince or John Baldessari or Ed Ruscha can do, Eric Doeringer can do too, as he demonstrates in a show at Mulherin & Pollard.

headline.seo: ERIC DOERINGER: ‘The Rematerialization of the Art Object’
headline.main: Eric Doeringer: ‘The Rematerialization of the Art Object’
headline.print_headline: Eric Doeringer: ‘The Rematerialization of the Art Object’
